question: Before I can ask my question I need to give you a little history.I am a white 39 year old male that has been diagnosed with type 2 diabetes.  What I have been told is that the type of diabetes I have is the type where my muscles are not using the sugar in my system.  I have been on pills and on insulin and nothing works no matter what the dosage is.I have also been having problems with my intestinal track this has been going on long before the diabetes by about a good 7 years.  I have seen a lot of doctors about my intestinal problem and they all admit there is something wrong but don
title: muscles are not using the sugar
